name: Spiked Savannah Smiles Milkshake
description: This is a Girl Scout Cookie-inspired milkshake for grownups only.
recipeIngredient: 3 cups vanilla ice cream (18 ounces / about 6 scoops)
3 teaspoons finely grated lemon zest, from 2 medium lemons
1/4 cup freshly squeezed lemon juice from two lemons
Garnish: whipped cream, additional lemon zest, maraschino cherry if desired

recipeInstructions.text: Add ice cream, milk, vodka, lemon zest, and lemon juice to blender. Purée until smooth. Divide among serving glasses, garnish as desired.
